use.flag: Build Dogecoin Core with dogecoin-qt GUI support

pkgmetadata.longdescription: This package is intended for use by Dogecoin Core developers and testers. The goal of this package is to simplify and make more convenient Dogecoin Core build configuration and installation process by taking advantage of Gentoo's package management tools.
